text: Crown Prince Moulay (born 8 May 2003) is the heir apparent to the Moroccan throne. He is the oldest child of King Mohammed VI of Morocco and his wife Princess Lalla Salma of Morocco. He has a younger sister, Princess Lalla Khadija. He is named after his grandfather Hassan II; who ascends the throne, he is expected to reign as Hassan III. In 2013 Hassan began appearing in public with his father at official engagements."Celebrations in Morocco as Prince Moulay Hassan celebrates his 10th birthday", Hello magazine, 9 May 2013 . Accessed 15 May 2015 Title 8 May 2003 His Royal Highness The Crown Prince of Morocco == Honours == * : Knight Grand Cordon of the Order of the Republic (31 May 2014). ==Ancestry== ==References== Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Moroccan princes and princesses Category:People from Rabat
title: Moulay Hassan, Crown Prince of Morocco
